LanguageData.StatsReport_MeleeDPSExplanation: OPS = oštećenje na blizinu * šansa udarca na blizinu / Period čekanja u sekundama
LanguageData.StatsReport_MissingBodyParts: Multiplikator za delove tela koji nedostaju
LanguageData.Stat_MineableThing_Desc: Predmet koji će se dobiti kada se ovo iskopa.
LanguageData.Stat_SourceSpecies_Desc: Vrsta stvorenja od koje je ovo uzeto.
LanguageData.Stat_Stuff_Desc: Stvari od kojih je sačinjeno ovo. Ovo utiče na druge stavke, uključujući jačinu oštećenja oružja, odevni oklop i izolaciju, predmet i tačke udarca građevine, lepotu, tržišnu vrednost, itd.
LanguageData.Stat_HitPoints_Desc: Koliko oštećenja može predmet primiti pre nego što je uništen.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_WorkToUninstall_Desc: Količina posla koja je potrebna da se ovo ukloni.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_CreatedAt_Desc: Koje prostorije se mogu koristiti za proizvodnju ovoga.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Damage_Desc: Količina oštećenja koju ovo oružje zadaje.\n\nOvo može biti odbijeno ili ublaženo oklopom mete.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Drug_MedicineXpGainFactor_Des: Multiplikator za količinu iskustva koju doktori dobijaju kada tretiraju pacijenta.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Apparel_Covers_Desc: Koje delove tela ovo pokriva.\n\nOklop ne štiti one delove tela koje ne pokriva.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Apparel_Layer_Desc: Koji slojevi odeće to ispunjavaju.\n\nZa izabrani deo tela, samo jedan komad odeće se može nositi na svakom sloju.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_FertilityRequirement_De: Minimalna plodnost zemlje koja je potrebna ovoj biljci da raste.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_FertilitySensitivity_De: Koliko je ova biljka osetljiva na plodnost zemljišta.\n\nNiska osetljivost označava da će biljka rasti otprilike istom brzinom na bogatom i na osiromašenom zemljištu. Visoka osetljivost označava da će biljka rasti sporije na osiromašenom, a brže na bogatom zemljištu.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_LightRequirement_Desc: Količina svetlosti potrebna ovoj biljci da raste.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_LifeSpan_Desc: Životni vek ove biljke.\n\nBiljke umiru prirodno kada dostignu određenu starost, čak iako se ne uberu.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_HarvestYield_Desc: Količina ploda koja će biti ubrana kada se biljka požanje.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_MinGrowthTemperature_De: Minimalna temperatura na kojoj biljka može preživeti.\n\nNiže temperature mogu vremenom oštetiti biljku.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_MaxGrowthTemperature_De: Maksimalna temperatura na kojoj biljka može preživeti.\n\nViše temperature mogu vremenom oštetiti biljku.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Plant_MinGrowingSkillToSow_De: Minimalne veštine potrebne da farmer poseje ovu biljku.
LanguageData.Stat_Race_Diet_Desc: Koliko vrsta hrane ovo stvorenje može jesti.\n\nMože jesti: {0}
LanguageData.Stat_Race_LeatherType_Desc: Vrsta kože koju će dati ova životinja kada bude ubijena.
LanguageData.Stat_Race_Animal_TameFailedRevengeChance: Šansa da će ovo stvorenje napasti krotitelja ukoliko on omane u pripitomljavanju.
LanguageData.Stat_Race_Trainability_Desc: Mentalni sklop ovog stvorenja povodom treninga. Ovo je kombinacija inteligencije i pažljivosti. Određuje za koju vrstu zadataka se ovo stvorenje može trenirati.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Ingestible_Joy_Desc: Rekreaciona vrednost uzimanja ovoga. Veći brojevi će više zasititi rekreacione potrebe.
LanguageData.Stat_Race_BodySize_Desc: The size of this creature's body, compared to an average adult human.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_MeleeWarmupTime_Desc: How much time passes between when a melee attack with this weapon begins and when it hits.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_BurstShotCount_Desc: The amount of shots this weapon fires in each burst.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_BurstShotFireRate_Desc: The fire rate of this weapon during each burst.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_Range_Desc: The maximum range of this weapon.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_MissRadius_Desc: The radius of random spread on shots fired by this weapon.\n\nHigh values make projectiles disperse randomly around the target.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_DirectHitChance_Desc: The chance that a shot will directly hit its target if not intercepted, dodged or stopped.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_MoodChange_Desc: This body part's effect on the mood of the owner.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_Skill_Desc: The main skill used while performing this recipe.\n\nIt determines the quality of the result, and is learned while performing this recipe.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_Ingredients_Desc: The ingredients required to perform this recipe.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_SkillRequirements_Desc: The skills required to perform this recipe.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_Products_Desc: The products produced by this recipe.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_WorkSpeedStat_Desc: Which character stat governs the workspeed of this recipe.\n\nThe higher the stat of the worker is, the faster work will be done.
LanguageData.Stat_Recipe_EfficiencyStat_Desc: Which stat governs the quality or amount of output.\n\nThe higher the stat of the worker is, the higher the quality or yield will be.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Surgery_SuccessChanceFactor_D: A multiplier on the chance this operation will be a success. More difficult operations have lower multipliers.\n\nThe actual chance of success of a surgery is also affected by the doctor, facilities, and medicine used.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Surgery_SuccessChanceFactor_C: Performing this operation is safe for the patient.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Surgery_DeathOnFailChance_Des: The chance the patient will die upon failure of this surgery.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_TotalBleedFactor_Desc: A multiplier applied to the overall rate of blood loss.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_NaturalHealingFactor_Desc: A multiplier applied to the overall rate of natural wound healing.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_FoodPoisoningChanceFactor_De: A multiplier applied to the chance of accidentally cooking a meal with food poisoning.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_BleedingRate_Desc: The rate at which this condition is drains blood.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_Pain_Desc: The amount of pain caused by this condition.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_PartEfficiency_Desc: The offset in efficiency applied to body parts affected by this.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_HungerRateFactor_Desc: A multiplier on the rate at which the food need depletes.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_HungerRateOffset_Desc: An offset on the rate at which the food need depletes.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_TirednessOffset_Desc: An offset applied to the rate at which the creatures rest need falls.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_TirednessFactor_Desc: A multiplier applied to the rate at which the creatures rest need falls.
LanguageData.Stat_Hediff_PreventsInfection_Desc: Whether or not this will prevent infections.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_TerrainRequirement_Desc: This can only be placed on terrain of these types.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Terrain_Fine_Desc: This floor is considered fine and suitable for royalty.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_PowerConsumption_Desc: The amount of power this building will draw from the power grid.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_BodyPartEfficiency_Desc: The overall efficiency of this body part.
LanguageData.Stat_Thing_Weapon_Biocoded_Desc: This item has been coded to only accept a particular individual's bio-signature.
